description: Fort Hays State University prides itself on quality education at an affordable price. Graduates in this program can expect to pay approximately ${tuitionCost}* (${location}) during their time as a student.
footnote: *Estimated cost based on ${creditHours} credit hours required to complete the program at the FHSU Online graduate tuition rate (${pricePerHour}/credit hour) for online courses. Actual price may vary. Tuition and Fees are subject to change with annual approval by the Kansas Board of Regents.
